title: White Camellia Ultra-Smoothing Shampoo 11oz
description: For Dry, Coarse, Unruly Hair          Extremely emollient anti-frizz formula. Tame unruly hair      with this ultra-smoothing shampoo. Protein-enriched,      moisturizing formula strengthens as it protects against heat      damage and breakage, restoring manageability for the look you      want—whether it's silky, shiny lengths or soft, controlled      curls.                             FEATURES        BENEFITS                    White Camellia & Sweet Almond Oils        Deep-condition, smooth & protect                    Soy Protein        Strengthens hair fiber                    Vegetable Glycerin        Increases moisture retention                           INGREDIENTS: Deionized Water, Vegetable Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Soy      Protein (made from organic, non-GMO soybeans), Coconut Oil-Corn      Oil Soap, Sweet Almond Oil, White Camellia Oil, Carrageenan,      Organic Geranium Oil, Organic Lavender Oil, Linoleic Acid      (Vitamin F), Organic Rosa Mosqueta® Rose Hip Seed Oil, Vitamin      E, Macadamia Nut and Aloe Vera Oils, Aubrey's Preservative      (Citrus Seed Extract, Vitamins A, C and E).

title: Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion, 2 Ounce
description: Lightweight Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions Daily Moisturizing Lotion helps control oil and protect against blemishes without irritating your skin. Formulated with lemongrass, witch hazel, goldenseal and hops, this 100% natural acne treatment helps calm irritated skin. It also contains salicylic acid, derived naturally from willow bark extract, to penetrate clogged pores, help reduce acne and prevent future breakouts. Dermatologist tested and noncomedogenic, this daily facial lotion helps promote clear, smooth, healthy looking skin. For best results, use as part of the Burt's Bees Natural Acne Solutions regimen. Put the power of nature to work for your skin with Burt's Bees.

title: Burt's Bees Acne Purifying Gel Cleanser, 5 Ounce Bottle
description: This cleanser is clinically proven to help wash away oil and impurities without over-drying or irritating skin. Salicylic acid, derived naturally from Willow Bark, penetrates pores to help reduce acne and prevent future breakouts. Evening Primrose and Beet Root extracts help soothe for healthy-looking skin. 99.4% Natural

title: Burt's Bees Acne Targeted Spot Treatment, 0.26 Ounce Bottle
description: This natural acne spot treatment is clinically proven to help reduce and improve the appearance of blemishes. It’s formulated with tea tree, calendula, yarrow and parsley extracts to help soothe skin and reduce redness and borage extract to promote healthy skin resulting in clear and smooth skin, naturally. 100% Natural
